attributes.action: Remove the non-examined assessment from the Edexcel GCSE Computer Science course
attributes.background: As current Year 11's, studying GCSE Computer Science, we strongly believe it is unfair and unnecessary to be forced to complete the twenty hour non‐examined assessment which will not contribute to our overall GCSE grade.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on Edexcel, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
